name: Leslomy Tacema (V)
Lore: 'Female Duros. Expert pilot. Helps run the docking facilities in Mos Eisley. Friends with Ellorrs Madak. Approves all cargo manifests. Forgiving of minor transgressions.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything she pilots. While on Tatooine, your docking bay transit to and from Tatooine is free. Power +2 at Cantina, Mos Eisley, or a docking bay. During your deploy phase, may deploy one Bo Shuda, Ellorrs Madak, or Yerka Mig on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
